name: ParaSHOTical ARKtiviBeatings
description:
If you own the game, your friends can play for free! Have them download the demo and play as many games together as you want.

Paranautical Activity + Arkshot + Season's Beatings = ???

  • Murder your friends in classic Arkshot multiplayer modes.
  • Collect iconic Paranautical Activity items to build your character.
  • Explore a brand new procedurally generated map every round.
  • Count your shots as you fire weapons from the entire Season's Beatings arsenal.
  • Dive through windows with the twitchy Season's Beatings movement controls.
  • Dynamic team system allows for free for all, 2v2, 3v3, 2v2v2, or even asymmetrical teams!

Game Modes

  • Deathmatch - Gain points for killing enemies. Do the most killing to win.
  • Head Hunter - Collect enemy skulls when they die. Bring them to the goal to score them. Don't get killed on the way, or your killer will be able to steal them all!
  • King Of The Hill - Gain points for every second you control the goal.
  • Capture The Flag - Grab the flag and return it to the goal to gain points.
  • (BRAND NEW!) Flag Tag - Grab the flag and hold on to it to gain points. No shooting while you hold the flag, so run for your life!

Online multiplayer only. For 2-6 players.
